headline: IGR: Avoiding A 14% Yield From Real Estate
summary: IGR has a high expense structure and has delivered sub-par long term returns. Read the full analysis on this closed-end fund (CEF) here.

headline: Baron Real Estate Fund Trimmed American Tower Corporation (AMT) to Manage the Position Size
summary: Baron Funds, an investment management company, released its “Baron Real Estate Fund” second-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. The fund rose 3.61% (Institutional Shares) in the quarter compared to a 1.46% decline for the MSCI US REIT Index (the REIT Index) and a 6.13% gain for the MSCI […]

headline: VNQ: The 'King Kong' Of REIT ETFs
summary: VNQ offers low-cost, diversified REIT exposure with top holdings and rate cut tailwinds, making it a strong core real estate play. Find out why VNQ ETF is a buy.
